links.title: Micron/China Holding Markets Back
links.description: Just before the July 4 th holiday, the US equity markets were about to rally above a defined wedge formation that has been defining price range for the past 7+ days. As the markets opened on July 3 rd, prices had already started to rally and appeared to be ready to rocket higher by a decent amount.

links.title: Big Tech Companies In The Hunt For Former EPA Scott Pruitt's Services
links.description: WASHINGTON, D.C. - It only took a day for embattled former EPA head Scott Pruitt to receive plenty of job offers. It would make sense that he would return to the energy sector, his area of experience, but big-time players in tech have jumped to the front of the line.
